content: That kind of fortune is rarer than seeing a tumbleweed roll by, especially... when shared with friends!

content: {A加油}My ears caught the wind bringing good news — there'll be a meteor shower tonight. Bahati sana!

content: Where I come from, special occasions like this call for wearing {A抱歉}something special... though I haven't chosen anything yet. *ahem* Or, why don't you decide for me?
